attributes.action: Repeal the elements of equality and diversity legislation which enable employers to discriminate against employees who are practising Christians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The case of Caroline Petrie, reported in the national press on 2 February 2009, as having been suspended from work and facing the threat of disciplinary action from her employers (North Somerset Primary Care Trust), simply for the offer to pray for an elderly patient who had received medical treatment, highlights once again the way in which our equalities legislation has the perverse effect of discriminating against practising Christians in the UK.
